verbs.description: A review of the show and the scene as [ARG1: Roseanne Barr] , no stranger to [V: being] [ARG2: a lightning rod for controversy] , was back out on the road in Vegas , with both her and her show " Roseanne " having come under fire for her sympathetic views about President Trump
